sentences.en: ‘I’m not going to do it,’ said Margaret decidedly.
sentences.cn: “这件事我不做。” 玛格丽特坚决地说。
埃米看上去显然是忧心忡忡。

sentences.en: But the public and Congressional temper was decidedly different.
sentences.cn: 但是公众和国会的情绪是绝然不同的.

sentences.en: Cole’s style is decidedly more formal than the previous manager’s.
sentences.cn: 科尔的待人处事风格显然比前任经理要拘谨。

sentences.en: Despite her religious upbringing, Aileen was decidedly a victim of her temperament.
sentences.cn: 尽管受了宗教教育, 爱玲无疑是个非常任性的人.

sentences.en: He made all the other players on the field look decidedly ordinary.
sentences.cn: 他使场上所有其他运动员都黯然失色.

sentences.en: His musical achievements have been decidedly slender.
sentences.cn: 他在音乐上的成就微不足道.

sentences.en: I came from a family that was decidedly oddball you know.
sentences.cn: 你要知道，我的家人个个古怪得紧。

sentences.en: In the East the progressive revolt had a more decidedly urban complexion.
sentences.cn: 在东部,进步派的反叛带有更明显的城市色彩.

sentences.en: It all sounds decidedly risky to me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,这一切听起来太危险了.

sentences.en: It soon became clear that authors were decidedly in the majority.
sentences.cn: 作家占绝大多数，这一点很快就变得明了起来。

sentences.en: Sometimes he is decidedly uncomfortable at what he sees on the screen.
sentences.cn: 他有时会对屏幕上出现的画面明显感到不自在。

sentences.en: The atmosphere in the room was decidedly frosty.
sentences.cn: 房间里的气氛明显很冷.

sentences.en: The minister tremulously , but decidedly , repelled the old man's arm.
sentences.cn: 而丁梅斯代尔牧师却 哆里哆嗦 地断然推开了那老人的胳臂.

sentences.en: The worst sign of age was in the fabric which looked decidedly ancient.
sentences.cn: 岁月最无情的痕迹留在了那块看起来明显很古老的织物上。

sentences.en: Their optimism is apt to be decidedly conditional and tremulous.
sentences.cn: 他们的乐观主义显然是有条件的而且是犹豫不定的.

sentences.en: They did show decidedly corporatist tendencies.
sentences.cn: 他们确实表现出明显的社团主义倾向。

words.tran_cn: 明确的；显然的；坚决的，果断的
决定性的；果断的，坚定的
果断地；断然地；明显；毫无疑问

trans.tran_cn: 明确地，坚决地，果断地，毫无疑问地
trans.tran_en: in a way that shows that you are very sure about a decision
